UrbworldSexSlave3.desc: Emmie-t eladták a szexuális rabszolgának. Embertelenül vonzónak teremtették és túl gyenge volt, hogy gazdái ellen lázadjon. Több tucat tulajdonos adta kézről-kézre, és fogalma sem volt, milyen a szabadság.

GunKid23.title: Fegyverrajongó
GunKid23.desc:
Growing up in a urbvilág, [PAWN_nameDef] never had it easy. Every day was a struggle and pollution, hunger, and gangs of older kids.
In the little space he had to himself, he studied his passion - guns, combat tactics, and war history.

UrbworldSergeant29.title: Urbvilági őrmester
UrbworldSergeant29.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s passion for all things militaristic kept with him all the way to adulthood.
After enrolling as a local policeman, he was soon promoted to sergeant.

FeudalLordling43.title: Feudális lordocska
FeudalLordling43.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a feudal world that was part of a multi-planet empire. As the son of a high lord, he enjoyed many privileges.
he learned to maneuver in the both the political landscape and in close quarters combat.

SystemLord80.title: Rendszerúr
SystemLord80.desc: For [PAWN_nameDef], ruling a country, or even a planet, was not good enough. he sought to expand his influence across the system - by legal or extralegal means.

FeudalFarmBoy93.title: Feudális rabszolga
FeudalFarmBoy93.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was the son of a medieval farmer, and was expected to follow in his footsteps. He was brought up as a kind, well trained farm boy.
He lived in an unusual feudal kingdom which co-existed with a midworld society which was itself well-known for genetic manipulation.

HunterOfTheKing84.title: A király vadásza
HunterOfTheKing84.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was forced to protect his colony in the name of the king after a mysterious outbreak of murderous genetically-modified wildlife.
Despite his best efforts, his kingdom was destroyed. [PAWN_nameDef] developed PTSD, a hatred of animals and a bad case of technophobia. he was named for the place they found him.

SpaceFanboy44.title: Űr rajongó
SpaceFanboy44.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] dreamed of space travel. He built his own pretend spaceship from an old police box and went to see the great unknown.

Castaway87.title: Számkivetett
Castaway87.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a passenger on a routine interstellar transit. When his ship was destroyed, he lived as a castaway on an uninhabited planet for several years.

GlitterworldNerd18.title: Szupervilági kocka
GlitterworldNerd18.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] loved technology from the day he was born. he had a mechanoid companion which he tried to modify when he was 10.
his obsession with technology meant that he never appreciated arts or culture.

EnergyResearcher67.title: Energetikai kutató
EnergyResearcher67.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was working on an idea for rapid communication over long distances. he made an error which destroyed his lab and most of the city. he fled the planet to escape the authorities.

WarChild73.title: Háború gyermeke
WarChild73.desc: Mushinto's parents were drafted into a civil war in his home country. Growing up surrounded by fighting and death, he became well-accustomed to tragedy and tough as nails. His expressive side, however, never developed.

BountyHunter22.title: Fejvadász
BountyHunter22.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bounty hunter on a massive glitterworld. he worked sensitive assignments for extremely wealthy clients, and was known for quiet execution and total discretion.

UpperUrbworlder31.title: Urbvilági előkelőség
UpperUrbworlder31.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] had a privileged childhood on a major urbvilág. Living in an apartment far above the dense poverty of the city, he spent most of his time reading or drawing the cityscape he saw through his window.

Missionary99.title: Misszionárius
Missionary99.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] decided to devote his life to religious service. he made a vow of peace and spent several years preaching and serving food in soup kitchens for the homeless.

IdealisticCadet67.title: Idealista kadét
IdealisticCadet67.desc:
Raised in the military traditions of his forefathers, [PAWN_nameDef] was taught from a young age that he would be a great leader and the hero of the Dichter family.
He excelled at his studies and graduated from the academy with honors.

MercenaryPilot93.title: Zsoldos pilóta
MercenaryPilot93.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] convinced his squadron to abscond with their ships and make a course for the rim worlds. There they could fight for the causes they believed in.
His men were loyal and fought hard, but their ideals soon faded away and their cause became that of the highest bidder.

ChildOfGlass31.title: Az üveg gyermeke
ChildOfGlass31.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was raised underground on a "marble" planet - a wasteland of radioactive asphalt and toxic fallout.
To survive on a planet devoid of life, he had to learn how to farm underground and how to fight without wasting bullets.

LoneTraveler91.title: Magányos utazó
LoneTraveler91.desc:
After escaping his homeworld on a jury-rigged ship, [PAWN_nameDef] traveled to new worlds to experience their beauty.
he joined resistance groups and applied the skills he cultivated on his homeworld. he often warned of the nuclear horror he saw as a child.

AmateurBotanist14.title: Amatőr botanikus
AmateurBotanist14.desc: Spending many summers crawling through dirt, Christian found he had quite the green thumb. Instead of learning to cook the food he grew, he just grew more and more.

Undertaker26.title: Temetkezési vállalkozó
Undertaker26.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] roamed the galaxy offering grief assistance to those who've had a recent loss. While he never shied away from physical confrontation, he prefers to confront tough situations with a calm word.

ChildSlave6.title: Gyermek rabszolga
ChildSlave6.desc: Graham was born to a poor family on a rimworld. His father sold him into slavery at a young age and he was traded many times. A tycoon bought him as part of a child labor force and sent down into mines to look after machines and to work alongside them.

Mercenary75.title: Zsoldos
Mercenary75.desc: After escaping a crew of rimworld slavers, Graham developed a lack of respect for life. He proceeded to sign on to a mercenary group where he developed skills using guns and survival techniques. Graham did dirty work where he found it, and traveled to many worlds.

AdventuringChild46.title: Kalandozó gyermek
AdventuringChild46.desc:
Axle was raised to become an engineer. For years, he planned to stow away on a cargo ship and start a new, more adventuresome life.
One night, after his parents fell asleep, he managed to sneak on board a cargo ship just before it left port.

HiredAssassin2.title: Bérgyilkos
HiredAssassin2.desc: Axle was a master thief, working mostly for organized crime. Over time, he made a name for himself and shifted his business into the paid "removal" of human threats.

VideoGamer91.title: Videojátékos
VideoGamer91.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a midworld, mostly locked in his room, playing video games. he was warm-hearted, with a deep fondness for animals.
As he grew up, he turned to drugs to enhance his reality. During these trying times he found passion and refuge in the gym.

SpaceshipChef34.title: Űrhajó szakácsa
SpaceshipChef34.desc: Ryan got a spot on a ship by becoming the ship's cook. He enjoyed cooking and helping the doctor clean wounds, but he never got used to cleaning the dishes.

DreadedBaby46.title: Rettegett baba
DreadedBaby46.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was found as a baby in a crashed spacecraft. According to the ship's data records, he invented the nuclear device that powered his ship. Apparently, he also invented the sky and the hamburger, and is said to have fathered a race of tasty golden kittens.

DreadedDude16.title: Rettegett töki
DreadedDude16.desc:
Some followers say that [PAWN_nameDef] and his crew of misfits found the Fountain of Youth, many, many centuries ago, and that they caused the extinction of the dinosaurs on many planets.
There's even a religion about them, somewhere, involving noodles and meatballs.

Tinkerer43.title: Bütykölő
Tinkerer43.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a scrap-heap of a planet - the garbage dump of other planets in the system. He learned to make new machines from the dead parts of old ones. With some friends, he eventually escaped on a salvaged and repaired ship.

Engineer47.title: Mérnök
Engineer47.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] found a job as a tinkering engineer on the trading hub planet Irithir. Tough local traders forced him to learn negotiation skills, and he made good profits selling refurbished weapons and tools.

DisplacedNoble83.title: Megbukott nemes
DisplacedNoble83.desc: Born on an urbvilág to the ruler of three megacities, [PAWN_nameDef]’s prospects looked good - until a violent insurrection overthrew his family. Exile introduced [PAWN_nameDef] to hard work and combat, but some high-born squeamishness remains.

Minister88.title: Miniszter
Minister88.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed to secure an important position in the government of a minor glitterworld. he got used to the opulence, while attempting to keep his citizens content. he had ample time for pleasure and indulgence – though he never forgot how to do hard work.

ChessMaster6.title: Sakk mester
ChessMaster6.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] loved to play chess. he even earned the nickname Bishop for some of his craftier moves.
he never got into trouble - mostly because he was good at not getting caught.

Pirate3.title: Kalóz
Pirate3.desc:
As a pirate leader, Bishop was well-known for his cunning plans and chess-like traps. he was never afraid to sacrifice a few pawns to capture an important target.
his name has been linked more then once to strategies that overcame overwhelming odds.

Orphan86.title: Árva
Orphan86.desc: Born on a deep space station, [PAWN_nameDef] was orphaned at a young age. In the orphanage, he stood up for the weaker kids and fought off the bullies.

BountyHunter8.title: Fejvadász
BountyHunter8.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] is a self-employed bounty hunter. he spent his days hunting space pirates and collecting cash bounties.

Straggler4.title: Csellengő
Straggler4.desc:
Despite being blessed with parental love, [PAWN_nameDef] hardly knew his parents.
he was frequently left to his own devices which meant more time devoted to exploring his interests…and getting into trouble.

Spiceminer20.title: Űrbányász
Spiceminer20.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] made his mark on the universe as a spice miner assigned to the lucrative mining colony of Rural Pen’The.
Little did he know, Benn was about to embark on a career path that would change his life.

BrutalThief83.title: Brutális tolvaj
BrutalThief83.desc:
Growing up in a gang, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the brutality of the streets.
Knowing that showing weakness could be fatal, he closed himself of to others.

CrimeLord42.title: Gengszter fejedelem
CrimeLord42.desc:
Through brutality and cruelty, [PAWN_nameDef] rose to the rank of crime lord.
He relied less on his fists and more on his guns. His reputation spread faster due to his cold-bloodedness and ruthless methods.

BoySoldier88.title: Ifjú katona
BoySoldier88.desc:
War may never change - but the cast of characters does.
Born on a violent urbvilág, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained from a young age to fight the wars of others, and became rather good at it.

MarbleDoctor8.title: Orvos
MarbleDoctor8.desc:
On a bomb-blasted world, first aid is often the only aid.
[PAWN_nameDef] used his medical skills to help the injured and the sick. he believed that while guns and machines may be powerful, a doctor is even more so.

ApocalypseChild3.title: Apokalipszis gyermeke
ApocalypseChild3.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent his childhood on a post-apocalyptic world. He fought for survival from a young age, on a planet where trust did not exist.
He told everyone that he had no luck.

MobHenchman24.title: Verőember
MobHenchman24.desc: After being "saved" from his home world by a slaver ship, [PAWN_nameDef] was sold to an urbvilág crime lord, where he was used as a henchman. He specialized in low-tech beat-downs and intimidation.

OrphanOfWar9.title: Háborús árva
OrphanOfWar9.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] lost his family and home early in life. His life became emotionally hollow, but his painful memories drove him to survive.
he took several jobs, but never achieved more than a basic education.

MechWarVeteran31.title: Mech háborús veterán
MechWarVeteran31.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] fought against swarms of rogue mechanoids since he was old enough to enlist. he has bled on half a dozen worlds and has lost more than he cares to recall. These experiences left him hardened, both mentally and physically.

ImperialStudent49.title: Birodalmi diák
ImperialStudent49.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] studied on an imperial midworld where guns were banned and self-defense study was encouraged. The relative safety allowed him to focus on his botanical research.

PoisonGardener95.title: Botanikus
PoisonGardener95.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent almost all his time tending to a poison garden and became withdrawn from society.
In that time he learnt a few safe culinary and medicinal uses for the otherwise deadly plants.

PowerMadScholar11.title: Őrült tudós
PowerMadScholar11.desc: "Knowledge is power." These words sparked something within [PAWN_nameDef], and came to form his core drive. When not entombed within libraries, he would take things apart to see first-hand how they worked, with little regard for the border between mechanical and organic.

ArtificerRampant14.title: Féktelen feltaláló
ArtificerRampant14.desc:
Fuelled by the thrill of discovery and his own megalomania, [PAWN_nameDef] set out to invent new devices and improve existing ones, breaking laws and customs as necessary.
he formed a crew to gather materials for his work - and to deal with outsiders who might interfere.

TechHead3.title: Szerelő
TechHead3.desc:
Standing on the ship hull with his father in an child-size EVA suit, [PAWN_nameDef] loved space from a young age.
he was put in a Civil Academics Program. While pretending to be like his father, he spent his time taking care of plants in his messy room. his nickname was given for his love of circles.

SystemsEngineer17.title: Rendszermérnök
SystemsEngineer17.desc:
Like his father, [PAWN_nameDef] was a systems engineer. he was qualified in both colony and ship systems.
When not working, he would make mechanical figurines, read old books, or occasionally travel to uncharted worlds. Being introverted, he did these things mostly alone.

Orphan63.title: Árva
Orphan63.desc:
Left alone in the world without parents, Kevin did the best he could to adapt.
Having to take care both of himself and younger kids at the orphanage, he learned a lot about humans and how to interact with them.

NeuroScientist34.title: Neurotudós
NeuroScientist34.desc:
Kevin worked for a long time to improve the world's understanding of the human brain.
After succeeding in mapping the whole brain, Kevin joined a team of scientist on a quest to map the brains of xeno species.

Abductee43.title: Elrabolt
Abductee43.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was abducted at a young age and forced to do menial labor on a pirate ship.

PirateCaptain84.title: Kalóz kapitány
PirateCaptain84.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked his way up through the ranks of a pirate ship, eventually becoming captain. He leads his crew between worlds, making a name to remember.

BlackjackPlayer64.title: Blackjack játékos
BlackjackPlayer64.desc:
The only useful skill [PAWN_nameDef] learned from his tough military school was card counting. He amassed many enemies by cheating at casinos, becoming ever more edgy and violent as the threat of retaliation grew.
When he was finally caught, they burned half his skin off. He'll never be able to face fire or violence again.

HedgeFundManager45.title: Alapkezelő
HedgeFundManager45.desc:
A top hedge fund manager on a teeming urbvilág, [PAWN_nameDef]'s portfolio grew rapidly as he charmed clients with a sweet voice and devious intent. When the deal turned out too good to be true, he was forced to flee the planet with a bounty on his head.
As he travelled the stars he found a passion in the arts, making masterpieces fit for high society customers.

AcademyStudent38.title: Akadémia hallgatója
AcademyStudent38.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] went to school like a good space cadet would. He was very tall and was known for his good looks.
Though he worried more about his hairstyle than his grades, he still somehow passed the final exams.

ComputerEngineer94.title: Számítástechnikai mérnök
ComputerEngineer94.desc:
Bored of his code-monkey office job and missing the glory days of the Academy, [PAWN_nameDef] saw a commercial about the frontier where "only the strong survive".
With his wife Morgan, [PAWN_nameDef] undertook a journey into the unknown.

AspiringEngineer92.title: Feltörekvő mérnök
AspiringEngineer92.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] had a fascination with gadgets and gizmos. he took apart and put together almost anything he could find.
he got used to repairing toys brought to him by other children, and even fixed a few devices from his elders.

ExpertHandyman34.title: Ezermester
ExpertHandyman34.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] worked as a traveling engineer. he fixed things ranging from a simple communications array to the intricate software harness in his ship's AI meta-core. Nothing is beyond repair for him.

MedicalStudent46.title: Orvostanhallgató
MedicalStudent46.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] enrolled in his planetary army as a frontline medic. He soon knew the horrors of war and was deeply marked by them.
[PAWN_pronoun] left the military and his homeworld and began researching medicine and helping those he came across.

MedicSoldier92.title: Felcser
MedicSoldier92.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] enrolled in his planetary army as a frontline medic. He soon knew the horrors of war and was deeply marked by them.
he left the military and his homeworld and began researching medicine and helping those he came across.

HighBaroness81.title: Bárónő
HighBaroness81.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born as low-ranking royalty in a large imperial family.
She was placed In charge of running her home planet from an early age, and learned important political and cultural skills in that role.

ExiledResearcher68.title: Száműzött kutató
ExiledResearcher68.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s love of robotics was not appreciated in her technophobic empire. The High Cardinal of the system excommunicated her, and she was never allowed to return.

WorldSlider56.title: Ugró
WorldSlider56.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised by a world-hopping band of criminals. he learned not to leave evidence of his presence in case the group had to leave in a hurry. he also learned about medicine and hand-to-hand combat from his fellow criminals.

Villain66.title: Gazember
Villain66.desc: After rising to the top of his criminal band, [PAWN_nameDef] was taught the arts of villainy, from handling firearms to developing new weapons technologies. He excelled at bending others to his will.

MedicalStudent38.title: Medikus
MedicalStudent38.desc: Born into a long line of doctors, [PAWN_nameDef] was tutored in all fields of medicine, from herbal ointments to the modern synthetic drugs. he also picked up a healthy disdain for lower class work.

SpaceNavyDoctor72.title: Űrhajós doktor
SpaceNavyDoctor72.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] served several tours as a doctor on one of the few warships defending his homeworld. he learned combat skills while fighting occasional pirate boarding parties, and became an expert at treating gruesome combat wounds.

AspergersRebel92.title: Aspergeres lázadó
AspergersRebel92.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up as a rebel on an formerly-advanced rimworld devastated by war.
his Aspergers syndrome meant he struggled with social situations and was incapable of caring, but he learned hard skills like research and shooting very quickly.

GovernmentAgent83.title: Kormányzati ügynök
GovernmentAgent83.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] worked for the government against rebel groups and excelled in this capacity. During his training he was taught firearms, melee combat and medical skills.
Having grown up in a war-ravaged city, dirt, blood and dead bodies don’t bother him and he sees no reason to clean them up.

ShootingComa31.title: Lövöldözős kóma
ShootingComa31.desc: Nebulys fell into a coma at a young age and spent years dreaming about shooting. When he awoke, he was useless at most tasks - but he could aim pretty well.

SelflessHunter25.title: Önzetlen vadász
SelflessHunter25.desc:
Nebulys was a hunter of mysterious creatures that many didn't even believe existed. Sometimes the people were right - and sometimes they were wrong.
Along the way, he helped people in need.

PsychologyStudent50.title: Pszichológia hallgató
PsychologyStudent50.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] researched new religions and traditions and often dreamt of distant stars.
His dreams prompted him to ask what lay beyond the lights in the sky.

AcolyteOfStars49.title: Csillagok papja
AcolyteOfStars49.desc:
Ever the dreamer, [PAWN_nameDef] traveled across the universe to find the thing he felt was calling to him.
he became poorer and poorer, but used every means possible to carry on.

SpaceSmuggler32.title: Űrcsempész
SpaceSmuggler32.desc:
Tater's parents used him to help smuggle contraband between a cluster of rim worlds.
Aided by his small size, Tater became very adept at carrying out his parents' missions, learning weaponry, negotiations, and most of all smuggling.

SpaceRaider65.title: Űrfosztogató
SpaceRaider65.desc: Tater was the leader of a spaceborne pirate crew. Skipping between the rim worlds, he became the feared enemy of many settlements.

Abductee38.title: Elrabolt
Abductee38.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was abducted by xenohumans when he was still a baby. They experimented on him to understand his genetic structure.
As he grew up, [PAWN_nameDef] grew a little bit too big and strong for his captors and eventually escaped.

Spy58.title: Kém
Spy58.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was trained by his government in infiltration and espionage. he learned to keep a cool head and to talk his way out of tight situations. When talking didn't work, he was capable of more violent direct action.

BlessedChild20.title: Áldott gyermek
BlessedChild20.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born under auspicious circumstances to a midworld spiritual group and held in reverence throughout his childhood.
he learned to take care of the poor and give succor to the faithful from an early age.

WanderingHealer6.title: Vándorgyógyító
WanderingHealer6.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] studied to be a doctor, but was dissatisfied with his practice on an otherwise peaceful midworld.
Instead, he chose to pull up roots and travel to the rimworlds in order to care for people who needed him most.

YouthSoldier97.title: Zöldfülű katona
YouthSoldier97.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born into a long line of soldiers. He followed that heritage, joining a military training program.
He excelled in all physical training programs in his Marine course, and even passed most of the intellectual exams. While he was never particularly bright or nimble, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the value of hard work and suffering.

VeteranSoldier76.title: Veterán katona
VeteranSoldier76.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] fought many tours against pirates, rebels, and xenos. He endured the glory and horrors of war.
Worn down by drills, wars, and battle scars, [PAWN_nameDef] 'retired' to the easy soldier life of colonial civility enforcement. He spent his days polishing his war medals, knowing he had done his bloodline proud.

GlitterworldKid57.title: Szupervilági gyerek
GlitterworldKid57.desc:
The son of a genetically-engineered "perfect mate" on a glitterworld, Chaz was much more shy, withdrawn and nervous than his parents. he kept mostly to himself, studying science and medicine and taking on gardening as a hobby.
In his teens, he ran away from home, seeking a quieter life.

CosmeticReject25.title: Szépészeti selejt
CosmeticReject25.desc:
Living on the streets, Chaz submitted himself to an unethical cosmetics lab in exchange for food and shelter.
After some painful cosmetic modification, Chaz barely resembles his former self. Having been forced to work for the lab until he was rescued, Chaz is now too afraid to lash out at anyone.

FeralChild1.title: Vad gyermek
FeralChild1.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] and his family lived a hard but prosperous lives along with their fellow colonists on a distant rimworld.
One day a group of mechanoids attacked, killing everyone aside from Robert. He then lived alone in the desert until a group of raiders found him.

RaiderKing46.title: Fosztogató király
RaiderKing46.desc: Starting as nothing more than a slave, [PAWN_nameDef] rose quickly among the raider ranks until all knew his name and his ruthlessness.

Scout80.title: Felderítő
Scout80.desc:
Nate loved being outdoors. His parents enrolled him in a program that taught military scouting skills. He thrived when he was left alone in the wilderness.
Due to this upbringing, however, [PAWN_nameDef] did not learn the basic technological skills that are taken for granted by many others.

FrontierMarshal24.title: Határmenti marsall
FrontierMarshal24.desc:
Nate was the marshal of his colony. He tried to honorably uphold the law, but the corrupt local mayor killed his family and left him for dead.
After regaining his health, Nate arrested the mayor. he left his homeworld and started a new life working to make a difference in the universe.

TraineeAlchemist86.title: Alkimista gyakornok
TraineeAlchemist86.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a medieval world. He learned the basics of alchemy and medicine in one the few monastic schools on his planet.

ReligiousHierarch35.title: Érsek
ReligiousHierarch35.desc:
Ordained as a priest in his local community, [PAWN_nameDef] used intrigue and diplomacy to rise to the higher echelon of the clergy. He held numerous titles and lands.
One day, a merchant landed his spaceship near [PAWN_nameDef]'s home. he decided to accompany the merchant in search for new worlds and challenges.

MilitaryCadet54.title: Kadét
MilitaryCadet54.desc:
Orphaned as a child, [PAWN_nameDef] was sent to a secret military school on a harsh deadworld.
Taking quickly to firearms and survival training, he graduated with honor, transitioning into a leadership position in covert operations.

AnarchistRebel35.title: Anarchista lázadó
AnarchistRebel35.desc:
After being abandoned on a special operation, [PAWN_nameDef] swore vengeance upon the state. he formed an anarchist group dedicated to bringing down core world governments.
After too many close calls, and too few successes, [PAWN_nameDef] fled to the outer rim.

Pickpocket19.title: Zsebmetsző
Pickpocket19.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] witnessed his parents' murder at a young age. With no guidance, he had to fend for himself any way possible. Joining a small group of misfits he did whatever was necessary to survive.

CriminalSurgeon51.title: Bűnözők sebésze
CriminalSurgeon51.desc:
Being near many injured fellow criminals, [PAWN_nameDef] took it upon himself to work on them.
Although many people died, he did get better at using knives.

SpaceCadet74.title: Űrkadét
SpaceCadet74.desc:
Growing up on a rural farm-world leaves little opportunity for excitement and adventure, so when the Royal Fleet began a recruiting program on his home planet, Jake threw down his hoe and cattle prod to took up arms for the crown.
He served on the interplanetary super-destroyer HMS Thunder-Child.

SanitationCaptain74.title: Egészségügyi tiszt
SanitationCaptain74.desc:
After graduating officer training school, Jake was assigned to main battle deck on the Thunder-Child. He served there for a year before his "gallant" actions saw him reassigned to the maintenance corps.
It was with the maintenance corps he was dubbed Table on account of his legs.

Naturalist22.title: Természetbúvár
Naturalist22.desc:
Mitch grew up on a backwater planet with minimal education. He had to hunt and grow food to survive.
his family's home was frequently raided for food by scavengers. This made Mitch very suspicious and slow to trust anyone he doesn't know.

OverwatchSniper35.title: Mesterlövész
OverwatchSniper35.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] didn't know why he joined the military, but he stayed to protect his fellow soldiers.
Army life broke him down and built him back up. It taught him marksmanship, hand to hand combat and how to patch a bullet wound in a hurry.

Drudge29.title: Rabszolga
Drudge29.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was never sure what he wanted to do with his life. he spent most of his time doing low-wage jobs and wondering what his future would be like.
he entertained himself with space sims and survival games, dreaming of one day being somewhere more interesting.

Sightseer43.title: Turista
Sightseer43.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] traveled the stars. he could barely scrape together travel costs doing odd-jobs on stations, but it was all worth it.
he loved camping on exotic worlds and learning the patterns of strange wildlife. he never could focus on intellectual endeavors, as his sightseeing distracted him far too much.

BunkerKid18.title: Bunker kölyök
BunkerKid18.desc:
Ricardo grew up in an underground shelter, waiting for radioactive fallout to subside. His rich family had gained access to a luxury bunker city, while billions died on the surface.
Determined to one day seek revenge against the hated enemy, Ricardo spent most of his time practicing shooting in his private training facility.

GameTester24.title: Játék tesztelő
GameTester24.desc:
Making a new life on a barely-livable planet after nuclear war, [PAWN_nameDef] was able to fulfill his desires with money borrowed from his father.
He loved playing a particular colony simulator. His favorite thing to do in the game was to build elaborate hospitals. Spending most of his time playing, he forgot horrors of war and his need for revenge.

ChildOfDrifters28.title: Csavargók gyermeke
ChildOfDrifters28.desc: Ever since he was very small, [PAWN_nameDef] had never known a home beyond his parent's ship. They were a family of nomads whose meandering provided a constant change of scenery. his life was often perilous but never dull, and he inherited his parents' wanderlust at a young age.

WanderingCrafter23.title: Vándor kézműves
WanderingCrafter23.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] continued to follow his parents' nomadic ways, supporting himself with his crafting skills. But wandering is a hard life, and he often thought of finding somewhere to settle down and put his skills to good use.

TribalThunderer45.title: Törzsi dörgő
TribalThunderer45.desc: Years ago, [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe stumbled upon an abandoned gun vault. Believing the weapons to be sacred gifts, the shaman would select a child born under superstitious circumstances and assign them the honour of bearing one to defend the village. [PAWN_nameDef] is such a child.

MutinousCaptain98.title: Lázadó kapitány
MutinousCaptain98.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was taken to the stars by slavers after his tribe was decimated in a raid. Over the years he learned the language of his captors, eventually working for them as an interpreter and diplomat.
The captain only learned of [PAWN_nameDef]'s true cunning when revenge was taken by form of mutiny.

Gymnast84.title: Tornász
Gymnast84.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a professional gymnast at an early age. Thanks to her skills, she was able to leave her homeworld and enroll in a glitterworld university.
Because of the lack of career opportunities in gymnastics, she left the university unemployed and carrying an enormous debt.

IntimateAssassin99.title: Intim orgyilkos
IntimateAssassin99.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a professional assassin. She was sadistic, calculating, and appeared utterly harmless.
She preferred using intimate means to dispatch her targets. This fulfilled both her contracts and her own personal desire for control.

CorpBredStudent10.title: Vállalati diák
CorpBredStudent10.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was bred to become an executive for the space exploration corporation that owned his home planet. his family had been working for that corporation for four generations.
At age five, he enrolled at the corporate academy where he learned loyalty and ruthlessness. [PAWN_nameDef] excelled in finding diplomatic solutions where others would need violence.

CorpResearcher93.title: Vállalati kutató
CorpResearcher93.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a leading researcher for a massive space exploration corporation.

EarthColonist48.title: Földi gyarmatos
EarthColonist48.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born on Earth. As a child, he was launched into space as part of an interstellar colonization program.

SoleSurvivor90.title: Magányos túlélő
SoleSurvivor90.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a remote colony. When mechanoid centipedes attacked his home and killed his people, he was the last survivor.

MilitaryTrainee20.title: Újonc katona
MilitaryTrainee20.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was raised on a military base in the Xennoa system. he was exposed to many different strenuous activities and grew strong at an early age. he also learned negotiation, medical, and military tactics.

AWOLSoldier74.title: Dezertőr
AWOLSoldier74.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an infantryman.
When he was informed of his assignment to the Xennoa-Zartza War, he decided he did not want to be a soldier. He was able to escape via military spacejet.

Bookworm3.title: Könyvmoly
Bookworm3.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent his youth in the library, reading every book he could about the technical marvels of space travel, the engineering ingenuity of the space-faring pioneers, and the horrible yet fascinating tales of the mechanoid races. He vowed that one day, he would see these things for himself.

Explorer28.title: Felfedező
Explorer28.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] traveled from planet to planet, gathering samples, stories, and research. He hoped one day to compile a record of every animal, plant, mineral, and machine and device in known space: The Complete Traveler's Guide to the RimWorlds.

ColonyKid59.title: Gyarmati kölyök
ColonyKid59.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born the child of two doctors in a small colony. Because of his parents, he was always interested in science and medicine.
[PAWN_nameDef] never really got along with other children, and as a result became withdrawn and unsociable.

StarshipDoctor82.title: Csillaghajó orvos
StarshipDoctor82.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a doctor on a starship. He was a brilliant surgeon and dabbled in research of his own. However, he was quite reclusive and never had the best bedside manner.

CaravanChild29.title: Karaván gyermeke
CaravanChild29.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born on a urbvilág merchant ship to an entrepreneurial mother and an absent father. Born male, she disliked boy stuff, and got into her mother’s things all the time.
Eventually, she traveled with her mother to a glitterworld and spent her savings on a body she was happy with.

BountyHunter41.title: Fejvadász
BountyHunter41.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a bounty hunter on a massive glitterworld. he worked sensitive assignments for extremely wealthy clients, and was known for quiet execution and total discretion.

ReEducatedYouth59.title: Átképzett fiatal
ReEducatedYouth59.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] lived on a midworld where the government cared about the youth.
he was one of the many children who were taken from their parents and forced into the new education programs.

FallenOfficial66.title: Bukott tisztviselő
FallenOfficial66.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an official for an autocratic government.
When his superiors demanded he participate in atrocities, [PAWN_nameDef] resigned and escaped from his homeworld with nothing but the clothes on his back.

FarmMechanic1.title: Mezőgazdasági gépész
FarmMechanic1.desc: Growing up on a farming planet, [PAWN_nameDef] spent his time learning about the automated machinery that grew and harvested the multitude of crops.

OrbitalReservist8.title: Tartalékos
OrbitalReservist8.desc:
When the government declared that it would strengthen its military defenses, [PAWN_nameDef] was drafted and trained.
he was stationed on an orbital base, manning the defense systems and, in dire situations, descending in a dropship to the surface.

AccursedChild49.title: Átkozott gyermek
AccursedChild49.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born at the peak of a lunar eclipse. The elders declared him a child of darkness brought him under their care.
his entire childhood was spent studying the lore and rituals of his people - until the day of calling.

ShamanOfShadows11.title: Árnysámán
ShamanOfShadows11.desc:
When the monsters of fire came from the sky, [PAWN_nameDef] was called upon by his tribe to guide them into battle.
[PAWN_nameDef] made use of medicines and rituals to inspire and lead the warriors of many tribes against the invaders. The pirates were forced to retreat without capturing a single slave.

AmateurAstronomer0.title: Amatőr csillagász
AmateurAstronomer0.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was fascinated with astronomy. he would spend hours gazing at planets and nebulae through his telescope.
he is credited with discovering a small comet that would, years later, strike a nearby moon and disrupt the mining operations there.

StationSecurity41.title: Biztonsági őr
StationSecurity41.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was commissioned as a special constable on a network of space stations. There he prevented illegal human trafficking.
Once, fire broke out on the station, and he saved many from the flames. Since then, he has avoided fires.

FarmHand64.title: Napszámos
FarmHand64.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born on a farm on a smaller colony world.
Everything was taken care of by the few members of the farm, including [PAWN_nameDef]. This helped him build independence, spirit, and a well-rounded character.

SpaceTrafficker46.title: Űrkereskedő
SpaceTrafficker46.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] discovered he was heir of his distant uncle's weapons-trading business.
To protect the future of the company he went through extensive military training, in case of any "unforeseen circumstances".

EnergeticPopIdol34.title: Energikus pop idol
EnergeticPopIdol34.desc:
Priscilla grew up on a glitterworld, training in rapier arts and singing. She spent several years as an energetic teen pop idol.
However, she decided that the music and modeling industries were not paying her enough attention, so she left.

PopIdolPirate87.title: Pop idol kalóz
PopIdolPirate87.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] and her fans set out as a space pirate crew. She raided corporations for money and staged performances to spread her name.
[PAWN_nameDef] became afraid of fire when a rival burned her stage down. She relied on her fans to do the work she found unappealing.

IcePlanetChild30.title: Jégbolygó gyermeke
IcePlanetChild30.desc:
Growing up on the frozen wastes of an ocean moon, [PAWN_nameDef] only had animals and a few hard-bitten sailors as companions.
The lack of social interaction made him develop a interest in engineering - but he never developed any great fondness for humans.

Roboticist69.title: Robotszakértő
Roboticist69.desc:
Sailors often died on the dangerous waters of [PAWN_nameDef]'s ocean planet. [PAWN_pronoun] created robots to replace them.
Over time, he collected a small crew of robots to do his bidding. [PAWN_pronoun] became proficient at mechanics and engineering, but lost the taste for manual labor.

ToxicChild43.title: Mérgezett gyermek
ToxicChild43.desc:
Growing up on a an Industrial planet, [PAWN_nameDef] started working in a chemical plant at age of six. Years of exposure to industrial toxins left him mentally scarred.
He eventually blew up the facility and escaped the planet in a stolen cargo ship.

StalwartFarmer92.title: Rendíthetetlen gazda
StalwartFarmer92.desc:
With the farm under constant threat from brigands, [PAWN_nameDef] learned to defend himself with his father's rifle. he also mastered how to construct walls to keep livestock in and predators out.
He once tried to paint a picture of his home, but discovered that he could only draw scribbles and ducks.

BoyScout85.title: Cserkész
BoyScout85.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was in a boy scout troop on a midworld.
He learned many survival skills including how to thrive in the outdoors and how to tend to basic wounds.

UrbworldPimp62.title: Urbvilági strici
UrbworldPimp62.desc:
At first, [PAWN_nameDef] made a small profit from selling drugs. Then, he switched to selling women and made a fortune.
he developed great skills with his fists. He also learned to fix up the injuries he inflicted on the girls.

ScienceProdigy74.title: Csodagyerek
ScienceProdigy74.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was top of her class in chemistry, physics, exobiology, astronomy and opera.
An unfortunate lab accident left her with a deathly fear of fire.

ParticlePhysicist78.title: Részecskefizikus
ParticlePhysicist78.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] performed cutting-edge physics research. She wanted to help build a better and more peaceful future.

SpeederRacer58.title: Fogatversenyző
SpeederRacer58.desc:
Rusty was the son of a fern farmer in the towering forests of Khalderia.
He found his first love in speeder racing, zipping in and out of the massive canopies and gorgeous vistas of his homeworld. The seedy underworld of racing also forced him to learn to defend himself with a quick word or a quicker shot.

DefenseLawyer45.title: Védőügyvéd
DefenseLawyer45.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] found that he could make more money with a quick word than a blaster. Seeking a job where his silver tongue could be useful, he turned to the law.
he often defended the illegal speeder racers he grew up with.

MercenaryRecruit18.title: Zsoldos újonc
MercenaryRecruit18.desc: Born to a long line of off-world mercenaries, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a busy trading hub. At a young age, he was recruited into one of the mercenary crews.

Ranger6.title: Vadőr
Ranger6.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lived alone, deep in a forest. he protected the wildlife against poachers, and learned to satisfy his own material needs without outside help.

MarineCadet35.title: Tengerész kadét
MarineCadet35.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was in a planetary marine cadet program.
he was kicked out for shooting an officer. It was never established whether this was an accident.

ClanChief14.title: Klán főnök
ClanChief14.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] managed a small criminal clan on an outlying trade hub world.

YoungPsychologist48.title: Fiatal pszichológus
YoungPsychologist48.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born and raised on a poor midworld, in the front passenger seat of his mother's cab.
Watching pedestrians and listening to the taxi passengers all day long, he soon became very good at figuring out someone's real purpose.

FactionLeader4.title: Frakcióvezér
FactionLeader4.desc:
Early in his adulthood, [PAWN_nameDef] found himself surrounded by a gaggle of low-lifes.
For fun, he gathered them and lead them to a certain death. he knew then that he had the talent to realize his ambitions of leadership.

Tinkerer0.title: Bütykölő
Tinkerer0.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] spent his spare time creating things from his imagination out of scrap metal and discarded machinery.
he created simple robots and small tools, for both for fun and for utility.

ProstheticSurgeon0.title: Sebész
ProstheticSurgeon0.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] used his talent for prosthetics to 'advance' others by replacing limbs and organs with metal and electronics.

LabGrownChild37.title: Tenyésztett gyermek
LabGrownChild37.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born in a laboratory as part of a altruistic but failed attempt to create a new class of human.
his childhood was filled with books and one-on-one tutoring. He was awkward, shy, and naive to the true nature of humanity.

CorpResearcher21.title: Vállalati kutató
CorpResearcher21.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was sold to a corporation and put to work as a corporate slave doing scientific research.
Unable to adapt to the social politics of his workplace, he buried himself in his work and failed to progress up the corporate ladder. Every day, he yearned to be left alone.

Orphan11.title: Árva
Orphan11.desc: Born in a brothel on a harsh world, [PAWN_nameDef] never really had a childhood. he did odd jobs to survive, and became distant from others.

SpaceMarine97.title: Tengerész
SpaceMarine97.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a member of an elite imperial space warrior unit. Subjected to intense training, he developed remarkable combat skills.
his unit's quasi-religious ceremonies and beliefs helped him stay more-or-less sane through the horrors of the war.

TechScholar50.title: Tudós
TechScholar50.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a youth scholar of the world of science and technology.
he strived every day to expand his intellectual abilities.

TechnologyDoctor83.title: Tech doktor
TechnologyDoctor83.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] performed research into propulsive fuels and energy generation.
he loved technology research, and hoped to improve human life by doing it.

PitGladiator5.title: Ketrecharcos
PitGladiator5.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was enslaved as a child and forced to fight creatures and other people in an underground fighting arena.
he showed an affinity for the sport, and eventually bought his own freedom. However, his time in the pits never brought him much intellectual stimulation.

PirateTrooper46.title: Kalóz
PirateTrooper46.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] joined a renowned interstellar criminal organization, and was often part of shock-assault boarding parties during starship raids.
Though his combat experience made him a good fighter, the ruthlessness of the job left him cold-hearted and unenthusiastic about social interaction.

FactoryWorker64.title: Gyári munkás
FactoryWorker64.desc:
Felix egy gyár munkásaként nőtt fel egy ipari bolygón.
Nagy volt a szegénység, az élelem pedig kevés. Bármit elfogadott munkáért cserébe. Nem volt könnyű élet, de Felix sosem kerülte a nehéz munkát sem.

CombatMedic42.title: Felcser
CombatMedic42.desc:
After his home country entered a large-scale war, Felix was drafted into the army as a combat medic.
His few years in the trenches trying to keep his fellow soldiers alive gave him an acute sense for first aid. Losing many friend has made him stoic and reserved.

RichBoy89.title: Gazdag fiú
RichBoy89.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a midworld with loving parents, a cute pet and a lot of money - but no friends.
he was always told by his father that 'those peasants just want your money'. So, he spent most of his time alone, or fighting other kids.

HiredGun38.title: Zsoldos
HiredGun38.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] always wanted to prove he could make a living without his parents' help. he did shady jobs that often involved pointing guns at innocent people.
He eventually made enough money to board a cheap freighter. He discovered why it was so cheap when it crashed.

Athlete39.title: Sportoló
Athlete39.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was professional athlete at early age. Thanks to her skills, she was able to leave her homeworld and enroll in a glitterworld university of science and technology.
Because of her demanding schedule and introverted nature, she became socially inept.

StilettoAssassin36.title: Orgyilkos
StilettoAssassin36.desc:
Because of her skills, [PAWN_nameDef] developed a sense of superiority. In time, she lost her sense of empathy. She often got into fights, and discovered how easy it is to kill a person.
After realizing her talents, she became one of the most efficient assassins in the system.

SoleSurvivor11.title: Magányos túlélő
SoleSurvivor11.desc:
Hawke's entire tribe was wiped out by a mysterious disease.
Found alone and adopted by another band, he never became close with the other tribe members. He preferred to stay away from his new home, wandering the woods and tending the animals.

Hunter95.title: Vadász
Hunter95.desc:
Hawke was a master hunter.
He learned to track and trap any animal in the most dangerous of places, and had deep knowledge of many ingenious methods for taking down specific large animals.

MechanoidHacker97.title: Mechanoid hacker
MechanoidHacker97.desc:
The only son of a well respected mechanoid inventor, [PAWN_nameDef] had access to the materials to subvert and modify his father's creations.
he used drugs to increase his productivity. Unfortunately, the side-effects included persistent delusions of being mechanized, which limited his social life.

BattlefieldTech77.title: Harci technikus
BattlefieldTech77.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] had received firearms training, but his work was focused on technical adaption and manipulation of combat mechanoids on the battlefield.
he developed PTSD after narrowly escaping a primitive firebomb attack in a wheat field. The army medically discharged him from service.

ProjectSubject62.title: Projekt tag
ProjectSubject62.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was picked by government agents for the mysterious "Frame Project".
Due to memory blockages, however, he remembers very little about this project or its true agenda - only that there were few survivors.

MasterTrader96.title: Mesterkereskedő
MasterTrader96.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a master at trading. he earned his nickname by helping a village through a trying time.

HexCellArtist5.title: Hex-cell művész
HexCellArtist5.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] crafted sculptures from spent hex-cells and traded them to a local museum for food.
After his popularity grew, he was approached by a pirate and abducted. The pirate kept him prisoner and forced him to create sculptures for sale.

ExoticChef70.title: Egzotikus szakács
ExoticChef70.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] has always gone overboard when it comes to food. he is always seeking new and exotic ingredients.
his quest for ingredients has brought him into some close calls with local flora and fauna.

PlagueProdigy51.title: Pestis csodagyerek
PlagueProdigy51.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s childhood was cut short when a mysterious plague hit his homeworld.
he watched his friends die, and his compassion for humanity died with them. In its place a new thirst for knowledge emerged.

MadScientist3.title: Őrült tudós
MadScientist3.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s lust for knowledge was only matched by his disdain for anyone who would stand in the way of his research.
Traveling from world to world, he sought answers to questions few dared to ask.

PoorKid84.title: Szegény gyerek
PoorKid84.desc: Abandoned by his parents, [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to survive by himself before he was ten years old.

Warrior73.title: Harcos
Warrior73.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a war hero during his planet's third world war. he helped prevent the launch of nuclear weapons during a particularly tense standoff.

Dreamer83.title: Álmodozó
Dreamer83.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an expressive child. he sang often, and made friends very easily, be they young or old, male or female.
he hated fighting, but when made angry, he could be dangerous. his temper was quick.

SpaceExplorer37.title: Űrfelfedező
SpaceExplorer37.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] once spent ten years trapped, alone on an alien planet. he quickly adapted to the local environment, and learned to communicate with his local enemies.
This long period alone left him without close friends. his heart is sensitive, but he learned to hide his emotions very well.

UrbworldUrchin29.title: Urbvilági utcagyerek
UrbworldUrchin29.desc:
Meredith was born in the darkest slums of her urban homeworld. Neglected by her mother, she learned to survive on her own, battling for every scrap of food she saw.
Eventually, as her talents exceeded her peers, she ascended from the depths to the surface streets and left her mother behind.

Smuggler68.title: Csempész
Smuggler68.desc:
As a contract pilot, Meredith had a knack for stealing goods and trafficking contraband without getting caught.
She eventually saved up enough to buy her own ship, and used it to travel from world to world dealing her goods in person.

MilitaryRecruit31.title: Újonc
MilitaryRecruit31.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born on a midworld run by an intensely militaristic dictatorship.
From a young age, he was trained to be a good soldier. They taught him how to use a gun and how to fight with melee weapons.

DestroyerGeneral23.title: Romboló tábornok
DestroyerGeneral23.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] held the rank of Destroyer-General in a powerful midworld military.
he was known for his mastery of weapons, and was also a good ship pilot.

StreetUrchin43.title: Utcai csibész
StreetUrchin43.desc:
Born to a poor family on an urbworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned on the streets at a young age.
He learned to steal and kill to survive the ruthless streets, gaining skills in melee and ranged combat. There was little time for talk in his life.

SerialMurderer98.title: Sorozatgyilkos
SerialMurderer98.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] started to enjoy killing people, so he did more often and perfected his methods. He lurked in the darkest streets, stalking prey for hours.
He enjoyed making artworks of his victims, and was known for leaving his signature on the bodies of those he killed.

KidScientist28.title: Tudós kölyök
KidScientist28.desc: Born into an influential family, [PAWN_nameDef] received the best education money could buy. Her intellect soon proved to be superior to many. However, her lack of empathy quickly put her at odds with her teachers and her parents.

MadScientist27.title: Őrült tudós
MadScientist27.desc:
After finishing her education, [PAWN_nameDef] was hired by the planet's leading genetic researcher. Later, she was caught running illegal, inhumane experiments.
Despite her family's influence, she was convicted and sentenced to hard labor on a penal colony.

HelpDeskWorker1.title: Ügyfélszolgálatos
HelpDeskWorker1.desc:
Due to his affinity for technology and desire to help others, [PAWN_nameDef] jumped at the chance to take a job at a help desk.
Unfortunately, the job's soul-crushing after-effects lasted longer than his enthusiasm.

SoftwareDeveloper84.title: Programozó
SoftwareDeveloper84.desc: After he gained the ability to use automation to remove tedium, [PAWN_nameDef] could no longer tolerate traditional education and employment.

MedievalThief48.title: Középkori tolvaj
MedievalThief48.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up poor and hungry on a medieval planet, learning to fend for himself.
At first, he only took what he needed. Then he learned to take what he wanted.

HumanTrafficker63.title: Emberkereskedő
HumanTrafficker63.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] stole children from their homes to sell them to interested buyers.
Over time, he lost what little moral sense he had left.

TraumatizedYouth87.title: Traumatizált fiatal
TraumatizedYouth87.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] lived on a pleasant midworld.
his prosthophobe mother fell sick with heart disease. In desperation, [PAWN_nameDef]'s father abducted innocent people and harvested their hearts. [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was arrested, but the child remained scarred from the experience.

MentalPatient75.title: Agybeteg
MentalPatient75.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was placed in a psychiatric hospital. There, he spent his time engaged in the calming activities of the asylum.
he was eventually released, but he retained his emotional distance, his curiosity about human anatomy, and his namesake manic giggling.

YouthSoldier59.title: Újonc katona
YouthSoldier59.desc:
Born to a long line of soldiers, [PAWN_nameDef] joined a military training program.
he excelled in physical training, and even passed most of the intellectual exams. While he was never particularly bright or nimble, [PAWN_nameDef] learned the value of hard work and suffering.

SpaceMarine36.title: Tengerész
SpaceMarine36.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a warrior in an Imperial navy.
his job was to punch into enemy starships, gun down the crew, and capture the ship intact. And he was good at it.

GalacticPage52.title: Galaktikus inas
GalacticPage52.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] served the high admiral of a space fleet. he learned the ways of court, including etiquette and speechcraft.
In his feudal society, it was considered a great honor to serve a man of such prestige.

EnvoyOfTheStars36.title: A csillagok küldötte
EnvoyOfTheStars36.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] entered the diplomatic corps. Honor and tradition were the values he took with him on every mission.
his prestigious position distanced him from backbreaking manual labor, allowing him to focus on his wordsmithing abilities. He left the blacksmithing to others.

ApprenticeSmith82.title: Kovácsinas
ApprenticeSmith82.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up helping in his father's smithy.
They were some of the last smiths on the planet that to use traditional smithing methods. They even collect some materials themselves.
Sometimes, after work, [PAWN_nameDef] would practice using the swords he forged.

Blacksmith7.title: Kovács
Blacksmith7.desc: As a blacksmith on a medieval world, [PAWN_nameDef] gained a reputation for the high quality of his work. he wasn't bad at using the swords he forged either.

CloneFarmed43.title: Klónozott
CloneFarmed43.desc: Clone children are seeded into organic-rich wombvats and rapidly grown in a simmed universe. They're harvested later, sometimes for food, sometimes for organs, sometimes for workers - but they're always called 'Disposable'.

CloneFarmer72.title: Klónozó
CloneFarmer72.desc: Harvesting the products of clone farms is mostly done by the clones themselves -particularly to those whose sims tended towards the social. This clone was one such, who escaped from the farms and headed out to the stars.

GangMember23.title: Bandatag
GangMember23.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up without parents. his whole life was spent alone, fighting for survival on the streets.
No matter how hard it became to survive, he never gave up.

GangBoss42.title: Bandavezér
GangBoss42.desc:
To survive, [PAWN_nameDef]'s gang often had to rob interstellar traders for food and supplies. Sometimes he had to kill the guards. Sometimes he had to kill the police who arrived to stop him.
After years of this, he became one of the most-wanted criminals in the local stellar empire.

MilitantChild40.title: Katonák gyereke
MilitantChild40.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s military family forced him to train in hand-to-hand combat and fighting tactics.
In his own time, he built small inventions. This sharpened his mind.

LostMarine42.title: Elveszett tengerész
LostMarine42.desc:
Shortly after being promoted to a respected position in his planet's military, [PAWN_nameDef] disappeared without a trace.
Later, he reappeared at the head of his own military force. No one knows why he became who he was.

Killer92.title: Gyilkos
Killer92.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a bloodlusting child. Villagers thought her the product of a snake demon and human coupling.
After watching how her human father betrayed and murdered her mother, she longed to see how many more humans she could get to fall into her hands.

Healer24.title: Gyógyító
Healer24.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] took the time to admire the beauty of the world.
Her passive aggressiveness surfaced once in a while, but she tried to adapt to her changing life.

ProfessionalGamer45.title: Profi játékos
ProfessionalGamer45.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was obsessed with video games since his hands were big enough to grip a joystick.
he achieved middling finishes in several local tournaments during the 16-bit era. Nobody noticed when he retired early in his teenage years.

ToasterRepairman51.title: Kenyérpirító szerelő
ToasterRepairman51.desc:
Good with his hands and passionate about technology, [PAWN_nameDef] aspired to invent gadgets and machines that would change his home world forever.
A few failed and occasionally disastrous creations later, he gave up on his dream and took a job more befitting his skill set.

DataDecoder89.title: Adatdekódoló
DataDecoder89.desc:
Born on a glitterworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was very interested in the process of documenting information, and quickly became senior glitterpedia recorder.
he was effective at self-study, but he was lacked in social experiences.

ArchotechSpy90.title: Archotech kém
ArchotechSpy90.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a cybernetic researcher. Studying a transcended world, he became too involved with his subjects. Over time, the archotech machine core recruited him into its service, and used him as a spy.
When he later rebelled against his non-human master, it sent mechanoids across space to hunt him down.

WolfPackMember64.title: Farkaskölyök
WolfPackMember64.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was discarded by his family. Raised by wolves, he ran, hunted, and defended his pack.
he learned to fight efficiently by tooth and claw. he also learned brutally effective primal hunting strategies.

BehaviourResearch88.title: Viselkedéskutató
BehaviourResearch88.desc:
Captured as a feral child, [PAWN_nameDef] was forced into the ways of modern society. he quickly adapted and became a behavioural researcher, eventually owning a private facility.
he specialized in canines, but learned a great deal about all animals. he never had interest in plants, however.

RebelStudent76.title: Lázadó diák
RebelStudent76.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up in a modest but privileged family who encouraged him to play chess and shoot skeet at a young age.
As a bored student, he found joy in challenging his teachers about the contradictions between his planet's official values and their government's policies.

PoliticalActivist17.title: Politikai aktivista
PoliticalActivist17.desc:
Matt was involved with a radical political faction which worked against his homeworld's government.
The guerilla tactics training that Matt received from his associates gave him the skills to fight, but also drove him to compromise his own beliefs.

Cadet58.title: Kadét
Cadet58.desc:
Born on the planet New China, [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a police chief and kept extremely strict watch over his son.
[PAWN_nameDef] had to do military-style drill exercises every day and keep his room spotlessly clean, always ready for inspection. he came to abhor violence.

Flaneur93.title: Ténfergő
Flaneur93.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] strolled and sipped his way through the streets and cafes of his world, pursuing freedom at every turn, never becoming attached.
Through all this time, he remained distrustful of others. And never took an order from anyone.

ShipTechnician36.title: Hajótechnikus
ShipTechnician36.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an apprentice technician on trade ships plying their routes between the stations and planets of her home system. In this job, she learned to fix and improve many machines.
Sometimes, her ship was assigned to short exploratory jaunts into dangerous regions of space.

ChiefEngineer8.title: Főmérnök
ChiefEngineer8.desc:
As chief engineer on board a large spaceship, [PAWN_nameDef] was an expert in all things fiddly and complex.
She relied on other members of the crew for some of the basic necessities of life. She and her ship eventually disappeared into a longsleep voyage of exploration.

BlacksmithsSon57.title: A kovács fia
BlacksmithsSon57.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s father owned the blacksmith shop in an run-down old city district. [PAWN_nameDef] would help his father whenever he could.
Later, his father took him as a blacksmith's apprentice and raised him as a man. [PAWN_nameDef] also to on shooting as a hobby.

BlacksmithShooter21.title: Fegyverkovács
BlacksmithShooter21.desc:
As a young blacksmith, [PAWN_nameDef]'s family shop was raided by the police. he shot two officers before they knocked him out and arrested him.
Sentenced to life in prison, [PAWN_nameDef] learned about traveling and raiding from other criminals.

JoywireAddict74.title: Örömchip függő
JoywireAddict74.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s wealthy parents provided everything he ever wanted. After discovering joywires, he became obsessed. Once his parents realized what happened, they cut him off.
Uncaring and often violent, he sought his next joywire fix by any means possible.

AddictionCounsel18.title: Függőségi tanácsadó
AddictionCounsel18.desc:
After recovering from a joywire addiction, [PAWN_nameDef] adopted a non-violent way of life and vowed to help others.
Travelling between communities, he used medicine, arts, and crafts to aid others who struggled with their own addictions.

ChildKnave84.title: Kis gazfickó
ChildKnave84.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a child-knave of King Loteric. he enjoyed the training with wooden sticks and engaging others in close combat. he adapted quickly to the heat of battle and was good at spreading fire.
he served his lord well, until the king died in an unfortunate accident.

BloodgameSurvivor95.title: Véres játék túlélője
BloodgameSurvivor95.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was sold to the Corestars Entertainment Company and used as meat in one of the company's system-wide broadcast shows.
his manipulative nature made him quite a nightmare, even to the audience. He was kicked out and exiled to a planet full of deadly animals, criminals and armed camera-drones.

WastelandWanderer96.title: Puszta vándora
WastelandWanderer96.desc:
Born into a wealthy family on a desert world, [PAWN_nameDef] was cast out after a hired attack squad destroyed his ancestral home.
The boy managed to hide in a cooling duct beneath his family's villa. Vowing revenge against the killers and whomever had hired them, Lucas struck out into the wasteland, alone.

VoidspaceRaider11.title: Űrfosztogató
VoidspaceRaider11.desc:
After years of seeking the assassin that broke up his family, [PAWN_nameDef] was offered a place with a group of space-faring raiders. He accepted, hoping to find the killer he sought.
Due to his seemingly-unending ability to narrowly escape danger, he earned the nickname 'Blackjack' in recognition of his luck.

SocialPariah3.title: Pária
SocialPariah3.desc: [PAWN_nameDef]'s family never fit in. They were oddballs who couldn't conform to their regimented society. Because of this, they were forced into cryptosleep and sent to different rimworlds, never to see each other again.

Vagabond73.title: Csavargó
Vagabond73.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] awoke on a dangerous planet with no resources and few survival skills. he bounced between camps, doing whatever work needed to be done, just to see the sun rise once more.

PyroAssistant56.title: Piromán asszisztens
PyroAssistant56.desc:
On an industrial world, [PAWN_nameDef] learned early that if he wanted to eat, he had to work. So work he did. Kids fit in places adults can't, and where he was from, the safety laws were quite flexible.
he was always a bit of a pyromaniac, and was banned from the kitchen after an unfortunate incident.

MachineFixer15.title: Szerelő
MachineFixer15.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was adept at dealing with mechanical problems, as long as the problem didn't involve the kitchen.
After a life spent around dangerous machinery and flammable chemicals, he learned how to patch himself up pretty well. Despite the pain, he never learned to dislike fire.

StreetUrchin73.title: Utcagyerek
StreetUrchin73.desc:
After running away from home, [PAWN_nameDef] had to live on the streets.
She grew up fast, and learned early that she had to figure out how to fool people into connecting with her.

SpaceMerchant75.title: Űrkereskedő
SpaceMerchant75.desc: As part of a freelance interplanetary lifestyle, [PAWN_nameDef] sought to dominate her romantic interests as much as her business adversaries. When she didn't have her own ship to fly, she worked charter ships for hire.

RitualChild22.title: Áldozati gyermek
RitualChild22.desc:
Born with a special mark on his neck, [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe chose to sacrifice him in a blood ritual. They left him in the forest to die. A pack of arctic wolves found and adopted him.
Over time, he learned to make tools to hunt with the pack.

BeastSlayer1.title: Szörnyölő
BeastSlayer1.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] traveled between planets, following news of animal attacks. he would camp on the planet for weeks, learning about his prey before striking. he most enjoyed hunting thrumbos.
Preferring to work alone, [PAWN_nameDef] enjoyed the thrill of the hunt, and the meat from the kill.

BrothelGofer59.title: Bordélyházi kifutófiú
BrothelGofer59.desc: Born on a steam-powered midworld wracked by a century of economic crises, [PAWN_nameDef] went to work at a young age. Scrounging, shoe-polishing, sewing - he did it all. But he was most known as a brothel gofer, delivering all manner of aphrodisiacs and chemicals to the girls' rooms.

DrugLieutenant78.title: Drogos hadnagy
DrugLieutenant78.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] worked the drug trade under kingpin Grady Loughman. He had his men sell drugs when it was profitable, and fight the other cartels when the government came around.
His social skills kept him on top of the political game, and he always had servants to cook and clean.

LaborCampOrphan63.title: Munkatábor árvája
LaborCampOrphan63.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] lost her parents in an industrial accident and grew up in an orphans' labor camp. The camp overseers worked their charges mercilessly - but at least she was clothed and fed.

UrbworldEnforcer67.title: Urbvilági végrehajtó
UrbworldEnforcer67.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was an enforcer of law on an ancient urbvilág.
She dealt with the worst of humanity, from protecting greedy urbvilág nobility in their spire palaces to rooting out cannibal cults in the deepest reaches of the underground hive.

GameFanatic28.title: Játék fanatikus
GameFanatic28.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a fanatical gamer who learned to survive in virtual reality games.
Once, while attempting to prove his skills in the real world, he was abducted by a criminal scientist and experimented on. he escaped, but the experience stayed with him.

ToolMechanic88.title: Szerszámkészítő
ToolMechanic88.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a famous tool mechanic on a dusty rim world.
After his firm closed due to scandal, he joined a tribe to survive, crafting fine knives and hammers, traveling, and dealing his wares between settlements.

ClassClown31.title: Osztály bohóca
ClassClown31.desc:
In the ultra-competitive environs of his glitterworld school, [PAWN_nameDef] always offered to play the class clown to diffuse tension.
he developed a sense of social desperation from this, as well as an appreciation for the artistic side of comedy.

CraftShaper24.title: Formatervező
CraftShaper24.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] locked himself in his studio for years, ordering delivery food to save time on cooking.
Eventually, his creations brought him the highest honor on Semantic World: Permission to materialize any design in minutes using the most advanced technologies.

CrimeBossChild70.title: Gengszterfőnök gyermeke
CrimeBossChild70.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was adopted child of a notorious crime boss. he was taught all facets of the family business, from smuggling to inventive ways of killing.
When the family was attacked, his father ordered him to hide in a secret longsleep crypt.

MercenaryLeader2.title: Zsoldosvezér
MercenaryLeader2.desc:
Alone, [PAWN_nameDef] set out to rebuild his father's life's work. he challenged the leader of a small band of mercenaries and took control, then led the band as they hijacked trade ships and stole valuable cargo.
his men mutinied. he was abandoned, arrested, and sentenced to death.

SentimentalChild62.title: Szentimentális gyerek
SentimentalChild62.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a nice child. When anybody had a problem, he tried to fix it. But, being a child, he did not always succeed. This hurt his sensitive soul.
he dreamed of being a soldier who fights raiders and aliens.

SpecialForces76.title: Kommandós
SpecialForces76.desc:
Give me a reason to kill - a good reason!
Markus was a soldier and a skilled one - so skilled that he entered the special forces to battle militants and xenohuman raiders. he never imagined himself a lone hero, but he played his part in the group well.

DustyFarmHand15.title: Napszámos
DustyFarmHand15.desc:
From the time [PAWN_nameDef] could walk, he helped take care of the animals and crops that his people tended in their arid homeland.
The work toughened him, but left little time for intellectual activities.

DromedaryKnight98.title: Dromedár lovag
DromedaryKnight98.desc:
Having caught the eye of his people's Sand King, [PAWN_nameDef] was trained in the Sandy Boomrat fighting technique.
Always with a camel to carry his things, he served his sand people faithfully.

HackerKid55.title: Hacker kölyök
HackerKid55.desc:
Born on a high-tech world, [PAWN_nameDef] learned hack computers at a young age.
Spending many hours tinkering alone made him very good with machines, but very bad with humans.

BattleMechanic73.title: Harci szerelő
BattleMechanic73.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was a tech-obsessed mercenary in an early fusion-era system.
he was unusually obsessed with gathering the right gear, and often customized his own equipment with original modifications.

VideoGamer63.title: Videojátékos
VideoGamer63.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on a midworld, mostly locked in his room, playing video games. he was warm-hearted, with a deep fondness for animals.
As he grew up, he turned to drugs to enhance his reality. During these trying times he found passion and refuge in the gym.

DischargedSoldier14.title: Elbocsátott katona
DischargedSoldier14.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] prostituted himself to fund his drug habits. As an escape, he joined the military and learned to fight.
Too smart for the army, he questioned and often disagreed with his superiors' decisions. This eventually led to his dishonorable discharge and left him with a chip on his shoulder.

Student56.title: Diák
Student56.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] studied chemistry and quantum mechanics for entertainment.
he was very good at convincing others to do his physical work, and made it a goal in life to avoid manual labor.

Chemist73.title: Vegyész
Chemist73.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a research chemist. he worked with chemicals, from pharmaceuticals to explosives, to develop new substances and treatments.

SuperSoldier47.title: Szuperkatona
SuperSoldier47.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s government ran an experimental super-soldier development program. They kidnapped thousands of infants, conditioned their minds with drugs and machines, and trained them to fight.
Most infants died, but [PAWN_nameDef] did not. He killed his first man at age six, and was fighting in field operations not long after.

SuperSoldier64.title: Szuperkatona
SuperSoldier64.desc:
Product of a super-soldier program run by a now-deposed government, [PAWN_nameDef] was lost. he survived the final suicide attack on the enemy mothership. What now?
For the first time in his life, he had no orders, no objectives. he rose from wreckage and strove towards uncertainty, towards freedom.

HeadjackAddict4.title: VR függő
HeadjackAddict4.desc: Plugged in to the computer via head-jack for days at a time, [PAWN_nameDef] found he preferred the company of computers to that of people or pets.

CorporateBuilder8.title: Vállalati építész
CorporateBuilder8.desc:
Even as he stewed in his own wasted potential, [PAWN_nameDef] found he had a knack for moving objects quickly. It was just what the planetary mega-corps wanted in their construction divisions.
Unfortunately, the monotonous work erased his remaining creative impulses.

UrbworldArmyBrat18.title: Urbvilági katonakölyök
UrbworldArmyBrat18.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up on an urbvilág military base. he was too young to fight, but he learned to make himself useful in other ways.
he became familiar with guns and military equipment, but never really got in touch with the natural world.

MechanicsEngineer22.title: Gépészmérnök
MechanicsEngineer22.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] loved solving problems and, with his steady hands and a reputation for quality work, earned a job as a mechanical engineer. he built and redesigned devices of all shapes and sizes.
Eventually, he was able to pick and choose his corporate clients. he made several wealthy friends, as well as a few powerful enemies.

PlagueChild50.title: Pestis gyermek
PlagueChild50.desc:
Born on a world wracked by plague, both of [PAWN_nameDef]'s parents were doctors.
[PAWN_nameDef] was raised in reverse-quarantine, under the Hippocratic oath. he experienced little social interaction. However, he gained a lot of medical experience assisting in treatments.

PlagueDoctor89.title: Pestis doktor
PlagueDoctor89.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] provided medical care on multiple plague-wracked worlds, always working under the Hippocratic oath. he improved conditions for those under quarantine while administering complex medical treatments and developing medicines.
he never had time to enjoy a normal life outside of work.

YoungMaster73.title: Úrfi
YoungMaster73.desc:
Born to two medics, [PAWN_nameDef] longed for power. his keen intellect and charisma helped him gain the respect of his peers.
Deciding that the best way to gain power was to climb the ranks of the imperial military, he joined at the youngest possible age.

ImperialGeneral39.title: Birodalmi tábornok
ImperialGeneral39.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef]'s thirst for power defined him. he quickly rose through the military ranks and soon attained the rank of general.
he was given with the most challenging task - conquering distant and unexplored rim worlds. Victory here could even position him as a successor to the emperor.

CaravanTraveler6.title: Karaván utazó
CaravanTraveler6.desc: Born to a family of traveling merchants, [PAWN_nameDef] was mentored by his father in the ways of being a trader. he was often tasked with caring for the pack animals. Due to his nomadic lifestyle, he hunted and bartered for his food.

Caravaneer11.title: Karavánvezető
Caravaneer11.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was the leader of a caravan. he was responsible for the safety of his caravan and was the head negotiator in countless trade deals.
he and his people prospered, but their wealth made them a target for brigands. They often had to take up arms to fend off bandits and highwaymen.

JungleKid64.title: Dzsungel kölyök
JungleKid64.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned as a newborn, and grew up among the animals of his homeworld’s dense jungles.
When he was a teenager, a traveling doctor found him injured near a road, hissing and meowing. He rescued him and took him on as an apprentice.

Aromatherapist80.title: Aromateraputa
Aromatherapist80.desc: [PAWN_nameDef] practiced aromatherapy, using essences extracted from home-grown plants.

FarmersSon39.title: Gazda fia
FarmersSon39.desc:
Ade spent much of his childhood learning biome farming. In his biome they kept animals to investigate which would cope best in the alien environment.
Due to this, the travel restrictions and oxygen rationing system, he rarely got to meet anyone from outside his family.

RebelFighter57.title: Lázadó harcos
RebelFighter57.desc:
When civil war broke out Ade remained neutral to either side, until his biome was firebombed by a loyalist militia.
Later, his unit gave him the nickname "Rare" after he burnt down the luxury villa of a loyalist leader, with them still inside it.

WealthyStudent75.title: Gazdag diák
WealthyStudent75.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] was born on a wealthy glitterworld. he studied at the Caspian school of Engineering, and excelled in mathematics and computer programming.
[PAWN_nameDef] grew up in clean, sterile environments. he never saw a farm or livestock.

Roboticist75.title: Robotszakértő
Roboticist75.desc:
[PAWN_nameDef] felt more comfortable with robots and artificial intelligences than with organic people, so he worked as a roboticist. he took a particular interest in mechanites and ancient technology.
[PAWN_nameDef] relied on other people for his basic needs.

StreetPeddler39.title: Utcai házaló
StreetPeddler39.desc:
Growing up on an industrial midworld where robberies and muggings weren't uncommon, [PAWN_nameDef] helped support his family by making small trinkets and novelties to sell to passers-by.
he learned early on that it wasn't always what he knew, but who he knew that would get him far in life.

PrivateDetective66.title: Magánnyomozó
